column1: Kata Robata////I especially loved the tropical roll I ordered - was topped with avocado and salmon
column2: with spicy tuna and mango inside. Mango! I have no idea why I've never seen this on a sushi menu before
column3: but the flavor popped - was just the perfect addition to the roll
column4: and didn't overwhelm the other flavors. My friend was a bit less wowed by her smoked salmon rolls
column5: but the fish was fresh; she'd just ordered something more boring.
